EmailTemplate.description: Template to send SLA notification to the ‘Case Owner’ when a ‘Case’ has remained in ‘Open’ state (not ‘In-Queue or ‘Closed’) for more than 7 days (175 hours)
EmailTemplate.name: ZZ_SBU Internal SLA 7 Days Owner
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.SLA_Category__c} Case# {!Case.CaseNumber} is aged '7 Days' and is not 'Closed'
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.OwnerFirstName} ,
Case#{!Case.CaseNumber} has been in assigned state for ‘7 Days’ and has not been closed.
Please review the case.
Detail Case Link : {!Case.Link}
Thank You,
SFDC Team
SFDCSupport@carefirst.com
